img_above_text:
![Wukong MiddleHollow 3.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/9/9a/Wukong_MiddleHollow_3.jpg)
A Grasshopper Guai will spring out of a cocoon as you cross, and defeating it will drop the **Locust Antennae Mask** (if you don't get it, you may have to defeat the other Grasshoppers trapped in cocoons back in the Upper Hollow).
img_below_text:
Immediately, you'll be presented with a choice: Going to the right of where the enemy was leads on to the Middle Hollow "village", while taking the left path leads to another optional area -- which we'll be taking first.
![Wukong MiddleHollow 4.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/8/87/Wukong_MiddleHollow_4.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 3 from the file 'Webbed_Hollow_-_Middle_Hollow_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong MiddleHollow 3.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/9/9a/Wukong_MiddleHollow_3.jpg)
A Grasshopper Guai will spring out of a cocoon as you cross, and defeating it will drop the **Locust Antennae Mask** (if you don't get it, you may have to defeat the other Grasshoppers trapped in cocoons back in the Upper Hollow)."
            - Following Text: "Immediately, you'll be presented with a choice: Going to the right of where the enemy was leads on to the Middle Hollow "village", while taking the left path leads to another optional area -- which we'll be taking first.
![Wukong MiddleHollow 4.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/8/87/Wukong_MiddleHollow_4.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image shows a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," where the player character stands at a crossroads in a dark, cave-like environment. The character can choose to go right, leading to the Middle Hollow "village," or left, leading to an optional area. This decision point follows an encounter with a Grasshopper Guai that drops a valuable item, the Locust Antennae Mask. The image serves to illustrate the player's choice of paths and the atmospheric setting of the game.
